§2Better Mob Animations §3v2.4.5 §fby Raboy13 
§627 §rNew Vanilla Style Animations!
New option to select between vanilla style animations (no jointed limbs) and default animations (jointed limbs) + §5Bug fixes and improvements!§f
Now supports texture packs (16x only for now)
